DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , non-interventional study woman 18 84 year age . Subjects provide sample genetic test information medical family history . The result genetic test combine clinical data validate method predict breast cancer risk .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non- interventional study . Women present image center routine breast cancer screen breast cancer diagnostic assessment provide write informed consent undergo genetic testing . Subjects also provide information personal medical cancer history family cancer history . The result genetic test combine subject 's clinical information , family history , risk assessment model validate new method predict breast cancer .
DOC.criteria: Women without breast cancer : 18 84 year age Western/Northern European , Central/Eastern European , Ashkenazi ancestry No history invasive breast cancer Women history breast cancer : 18 84 year age Western/Northern European , Central/Eastern European , Ashkenazi ancestry Pathologically confirm invasive breast cancer diagnose within past 12 month Unwilling provide write informed consent . Women history ductal carcinoma situ ( DCIS ) .
